mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.preview_report_form AS "reportForm.id", a.learning_resource AS "learningResource.id", a.learning_target AS "learningTarget", a.question_and_thinking AS "questionAndThinking", a.doubt AS "doubt", learningResource.id AS "learningResource.id"
LEFT JOIN preview_report_form b ON b.id = a.preview_report_form LEFT JOIN education_resource learningResource ON learningResource.id = a.learning_resource
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO preview_preclass_duty( id, preview_report_form, learning_resource, learning_target, question_and_thinking, doubt ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{reportForm.id}, #{learningResource.id}, #{learningTarget}, #{questionAndThinking}, #{doubt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE preview_preclass_duty SET preview_report_form = #{reportForm.id}, learning_resource = #{learningResource.id}, learning_target = #{learningTarget}, question_and_thinking = #{questionAndThinking}, doubt = #{doubt} WHERE id = #{id}
